{{note|This page is meant to be included into other pages that describe ZScript particle functions, such as [[A_SpawnParticleEx]], using the '''{{: SpawnParticle flags}}''' syntax. (This note will not be included.)

Note, this page also includes [[SpawnParticle ZScript flags]]. These are separated because [[SpawnParticle (ZScript)]] doesn't support any of the SPF_REL* flags. When describing FSpawnParticleParams-related particle features, use '''{{: SpawnParticle ZScript flags}}''' instead.}} {{:SpawnParticle ZScript flags}} :*'''SPF_RELPOS''' — Position is relative to ''angle''. :*'''SPF_RELVEL''' — Velocity is relative to ''angle''. :*'''SPF_RELACCEL''' — Acceleration is relative to ''angle''. :*'''SPF_RELANG''' — Adds the calling actor's [[DECORATE_expressions#angle|angle]] to ''angle'' for relativity. :*'''SPF_RELATIVE''' — Combines the SPF_RELPOS, SPF_RELVEL, SPF_RELACCEL and SPF_RELANG flags.
